name: Frozen Wastes
description: An endless expanse of snow and ice stretches to the horizon. The bitter wind cuts through even the warmest clothing, and the only sounds are the crunch of snow underfoot and the distant howl of arctic predators.

common.name: ice_chunks
common.description: Pure ice that can be melted for drinking water.

common.name: arctic_lichen
common.description: Hardy plants that grow in the harshest conditions.

uncommon.name: frozen_amber
uncommon.description: Ancient tree resin preserved in the perpetual cold.

rare.name: ice_crystal
rare.description: Magically charged ice that never melts, prized by frost mages.

random_events.name: Sudden Blizzard
random_events.description: A fierce blizzard suddenly engulfs the area. You spot what might be an ice cave in the distance.

seek_cave_shelter.description: The cave provides shelter, but you're not alone...

dig_snow_shelter.description: Your makeshift shelter protects you from the worst of the storm.
